customJS: function updateClock(){const e=new Date,t=e.getHours().toString().padStart(2,"0"),o=e.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,"0"),a=e.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2,"0"),n=e.getFullYear(),r=(e.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,"0"),d=e.getDate().toString().padStart(2,"0"),l=["日","一","二","三","四","五","六"],c=l[e.getDay()];document.getElementById("clock-time").textContent=`${t}:${o}:${a}`,document.getElementById("clock-date").textContent=`${n}-${r}-${d} 周${c}`}updateClock(),setInterval(updateClock,1e3);
